body:
Hi Andy,


thanks for sharing this.  I did realise that -c affected the sky, but 
left it in there just in case.  Would you happen to know whether 
genskyvec works exactly the same way as gendaymtx with regards to -d, 
-5, -s, -c?


Regards


Axel
